description: A frame was received that exceeds the negotiated
MTU size. The VPI and VCI of the VC for which this
condition was detected can be determined from the
index values for ipoaVcNegotiatedMtu. In addition
the ifIndex and IP Address can be determined as
well (refer to the ipoaVcTable).
The MTU used when communicating over this circuit.
variables.name: IPOA-MIB::ipoaVcNegotiatedMtu

description: The ATMARP Server has detected more than one ATM end
point attempting to associate the same IP address with
different ATM addresses.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IPOA-MIB::ipoaDuplicateIpAddress IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex i 9999 IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaNetAddress a 192.0.2.1 IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress s EXAMPLE IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress s EXAMPLE

description: The interface on which this entry's equivalence is
effective. The interface identified by a particular value
of this index is the same interface as identified by the
same value of the IF-MIB's ifIndex.
This object predates the rule limiting index objects to a
max access value of 'not-accessible' and so continues to use
a value of 'read-create'.
variables.name: IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaIfIndex

description: The IpAddress corresponding to the media-dependent
`physical' address.
This object predates the rule limiting index objects to a
max access value of 'not-accessible' and so continues to use
a value of 'read-create'.
variables.name: IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaNetAddress

description: The media-dependent `physical' address. This object should
return 0 when this entry is in the 'incomplete' state.
As the entries in this table are typically not persistent
when this object is written the entity should not save the
change to non-volatile storage. Note: a stronger
requirement is not used because this object was previously
defined.
variables.name: IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress

description: The media-dependent `physical' address. This object should
return 0 when this entry is in the 'incomplete' state.
As the entries in this table are typically not persistent
when this object is written the entity should not save the
change to non-volatile storage. Note: a stronger
requirement is not used because this object was previously
defined.
variables.name: IP-MIB::ipNetToMediaPhysAddress

description: Generation of this trap occurs when an ipoaLisEntry is
created while the ipoaLisTrapEnable.0 object has the
value enabled(1).
The IP subnet address associated with this LIS.
variables.name: IPOA-MIB::ipoaLisSubnetAddr

description: Generation of this trap occurs when an ipoaLisEntry is
deleted while the ipoaLisTrapEnable.0 object has the
value enabled(1).
The IP subnet address associated with this LIS.
variables.name: IPOA-MIB::ipoaLisSubnetAddr
